publ: by Matthew Vecera and Stephen Lambeth
name: BearWeekCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open bear week countdown”
”Alexa, start bear week countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bear week countdown
des:
The Bear Week in Ptown Facebook Group presents, Bear Week Countdown. The "Bear Week Countdown" skill will open with a sassy, pop-culture reference, then tell you exactly how many days remain until the first day of Bear Week in Provincetown. Then the skill will close with another pop-culture reference, play a sound effect, and exit without prompting. Simple.

The annual event, Bear Week, in the beach-front resort town of Provincetown, MA, is one of the longest running, most popular gatherings of bears and admirers in the LGBTQ+ community. So if you are counting down the days to Bear Week like we are, this skill will do just that!

Just ask Alexa, "Open Bear Week Countdown" to find out how much time you have left to pack for the biggest bear event of the summer!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
